summary: Completed comprehensive UI improvements testing for Hero and Body slides. Verified text background containers, new font rendering (Handwritten, Futuristic), and slide readability.

Body slide displays with readable text in background container
Text background container toggle functionality works correctly
Typography dropdown accessible with all font options
Handwritten font renders and applies correctly
Futuristic font renders and applies correctly
Slide navigation between Hero and Body slides works
Background prompts show appropriate content for slide types
Text readability maintained with container overlays
